### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Group at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Small electric poles at positions (-25.5, 28.5), (-25.5, 29.5), (-21.5, 29.5), (-15.5, 22.5), (-14.5, 23.5), (-22.5, 25.5)

### Pipe Groups
Consists of the following entities:
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=65978) at position (-22.5, -50.5) with pipes at positions (-22.5, -50.5), (-22.5, -51.5), (-23.5, -51.5), ..., (-14.5, 13.5), (-14.5, 12.5), (-14.5, 14.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=65979) at position (-10.5, 23.5) with pipes at positions (-10.5, 23.5), (-12.5, 24.5), (-12.5, 25.5), (-11.5, 24.5), (-10.5, 24.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=65981) at position (-36.5, 30.5) with a pipe at position (-36.5, 30.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=65982) at position (-32.5, 30.5) with a pipe at position (-32.5, 30.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### TypeError when accessing object properties
- When accessing properties of an object, ensure you are using the correct syntax. For example, avoid using subscript notation on objects that do not support it (e.g., 'Pipe' object).
